comment.author: 22334021@N03

comment._content: Looks like it was taken from the church. Should be "Tyn-y-cornel". Obviously taken before the new road was built along this shore of the lake - if anybody knows when that was built that would help to date the photo... It would be great to see this in the Old Tywyn and Dysynni Valley group.

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called www.flickr.com/groups/oldtywyn, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
